rows.label: qev091602_MSG0001
rows.name: Don't move.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0002
rows.name: Are you kidding me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_JNK0010
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev091602_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask the Murderess if she's betraying you.

rows.label: qev091602_JNK0020
rows.name: Trust

rows.label: qev091602_SEL0021
rows.name: Check if there's an indigen behind you.

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0003
rows.name:
So observant! What gave it away?
I knew you were a sharp one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0004
rows.name:
See, I'm allergic to sharing,
so I'm afraid the reward for this job is mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0005
rows.name: D'aw, that's ADORABLE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0006
rows.name:
If only everyone were so trusting, life would be so peaceful...
and so totally boring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0007
rows.name: But no, I'm afraid I just want the reward for myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0008
rows.name: I can't believe you're doing this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0009
rows.name:
Hey, I COULD have shot you in the back.
...I mean, again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0010
rows.name: Who are they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0011
rows.name:
I told you I planned to use the winners
of that fight on my next job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0012
rows.name: WE were the job? This is low, Murderessâ€”even for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0013
rows.name: Whatever it takes to make my dream come to fruition, sister.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0014
rows.name: You're still chasing that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0015
rows.name: Hell yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0016
rows.name: Now! Since we're all acquainted, you have a choice to make:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0017
rows.name: Give up your claim to the reward money...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0018
rows.name: or we break your knees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_JNK0030
rows.name: Cede

rows.label: qev091602_SEL0031
rows.name: Let the Murderess take whatever she wants.

rows.label: qev091602_JNK0040
rows.name: Fight

rows.label: qev091602_SEL0041
rows.name:
Tell the Murderess if she wants
your reward, she can try to take it.

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0019_m
rows.name: Smart kid! I bet you'll live to a ripe old age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0019_f
rows.name: Smart kid! I bet you'll live to a ripe old age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0020
rows.name: Unlike the grumpy little kitten over here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0021
rows.name: I'm reporting you for this, Murderess. I mean it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0022
rows.name: Right, sure. Whatever you need to tell yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0023_m
rows.name:
Ta-ta, rookie.
Maybe next time you and me can ditch cranky-pants here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0023_f
rows.name:
Ta-ta, rookie.
Maybe next time you and me can ditch cranky-pants here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0024
rows.name: We'd better get back and report this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0025
rows.name: That low-down, dirty, no-good fink...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0026
rows.name: There is no way she's getting away with this. NO WAY.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0027
rows.name: ...Yeah, I knew I should have shot you in the back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0028
rows.name:
You probably should have,
because we're gonna make this hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0029
rows.name:
Riiight. So hey, you guys handle this, all right?
I'm headed back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0030
rows.name: Make sure you grab the stuff when you're done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0031
rows.name: Yes, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0032
rows.name: You just signed your death warrant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0033
rows.name: Whew... Wasn't sure we had that one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0034
rows.name:
I'd love to find the Murderess and rearrange her face,
but let's head back to BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091602_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'd love to find the Murderess and rearrange her face,
but we'd better get back and report this.[ST:wait ]
